item.title: Alerts-X: Boolean
item.description:
The Boolean scalar type represents true or false. item.title: Alerts-X: ID
item.description:
The ID scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as "4") or integer (such as 4) input value will be accepted as an ID. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alertdata"> AlertData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/advisemessage"> AdviseMessage: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/interfaces/node"> Node: </a> <span></span> </li> <li item.title: Alerts-X: Int
item.description:
The Int scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alertconnection"> AlertConnection: </a> <span>Alert list</span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alertconfiguration"> AlertConfiguration: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/eventconnection"> EventConnection: </a> <span>Events list</span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alerttypeconfiguration"> AlertTypeConfiguration: </a> <span>Depending on the talert type, typeConfiguration will use some fields </span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alertprice"> AlertPrice: </a> <span>Price contains the specific configuration for Price alert Type</span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/groupconnection"> GroupConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/groupdata"> GroupData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/memberconnection"> MemberConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a item.title: Alerts-X: String
item.description:
The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/objects/alertedge"> AlertEdge: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a
